title: Introducing: Crystal Sister
content:
LA has a developed a habit recently of producing ethereal, dreamy pop, and Sonya Bender aka Crystal Sister is just the latest in a long line of emerging California based artists.

With her two debut tracks, Take My Hand and Suicide Love, she showcases a pop edge that seemingly draws from the likes of Gwen Stefani, in being super slick, whilst focusing on massive choruses, especially on Take My Hand. Check out both below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
